mapper.insert: insert into member(id, email, nickname, introduction, image_url) values (seq_member_id.nextval, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{introduction}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.post_count FROM ( SELECT id, email, nickname, introduction, image_url FROM member WHERE id=#{memberId} ) t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT member_id, count(id) as post_count FROM post WHERE removed=0 GROUP BY member_id ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.member_id
